languages.text: {n}После долгой паузы Хейнрикс вздыхает.{/n} "Ладно, допустим. Возможно — возможно — в последнее время я действительно несколько... изменил свою манеру общения. Видимо, давление обстоятельств и недавних событий повлияло и на меня. Я постараюсь взять себя в руки и проявить больше терпения".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс долго молчит.{/n} "Возможно — возможно — в последнее время я действительно несколько... изменил свою манеру общения. Видимо, давление обстоятельств и недавних событий повлияло и на меня. Я постараюсь взять себя в руки и проявить больше терпения".

languages.text: {n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."
languages.original_text: {n}После долгой паузы Хейнрикс вздыхает.{/n} "Ладно, допустим. Возможно — возможно — в последнее время я действительно несколько... изменил свою манеру общения. Видимо, давление обстоятельств и недавних событий повлияло и на меня. Я постараюсь взять себя в руки и проявить больше терпения".

traits.locale_text: {n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."

{n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."

{n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."

{n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."

languages.text: {n}海因里希沉默很久，最终叹了口气。{/n}“好吧，或许你说的有道理。有可能，我是说，只是有可能，我最近的举动与之前……略有不同。很显然，我们当下所处的环境，以及最近发生的事情，也对我造成了影响。我会努力打起精神来，尽量表现出更大程度的克制。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希沉默很久，最终叹了口气。{/n}“好吧，或许你说的有道理。有可能，我是说，只是有可能，我最近的举动与之前……略有不同。很显然，我们当下所处的环境，以及最近发生的事情，也对我造成了影响。我会努力打起精神来，尽量表现出更大程度的克制。”

languages.text: {n}Tras una larga pausa, Heinrix suspira.{/n} «De acuerdo, puede que tenga razón. Es posible, y solo posible, que últimamente me haya comportado de forma... un tanto diferente. La tensión de nuestras actuales circunstancias y los sucesos recientes también me han pasado factura. Intentaré recomponerme y mostrar más paciencia».
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras una larga pausa, Heinrix suspira.{/n} «De acuerdo, puede que tenga razón. Es posible, y solo posible, que últimamente me haya comportado de forma... un tanto diferente. La tensión de nuestras actuales circunstancias y los sucesos recientes también me han pasado factura. Intentaré recomponerme y mostrar más paciencia».

languages.text: {n}長い沈黙の後、ハインリックスはため息をついた。{/n}「なるほど、一理あるかもしれない。可能性はある…最近、俺の行動が…少し変わってきている。今の状況や最近の出来事の緊張が、俺にも負担になっているのは明らかだ。気を取り直して、もっと寛容になるよう努力する」
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."

traits.locale_text: {n}長い沈黙の後、ハインリックスはため息をついた。{/n}「なるほど、一理あるかもしれない。可能性はある…最近、俺の行動が…少し変わってきている。今の状況や最近の出来事の緊張が、俺にも負担になっているのは明らかだ。気を取り直して、もっと寛容になるよう努力する」

languages.text: {n}Après une longue pause, Heinrix soupire.{/n} « Vous n'avez peut-être pas tout à fait tort. Il est possible, et je dis bien "possible", que je me comporte un peu différemment depuis quelque temps. Je me suis peut-être laissé submerger par les récents événements et par la situation actuelle, mais je vais essayer de me ressaisir et de faire preuve de plus de patience. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après une longue pause, Heinrix soupire.{/n} « Vous n'avez peut-être pas tout à fait tort. Il est possible, et je dis bien "possible", que je me comporte un peu différemment depuis quelque temps. Je me suis peut-être laissé submerger par les récents événements et par la situation actuelle, mais je vais essayer de me ressaisir et de faire preuve de plus de patience. »

languages.text: {n}Nach einer langen Pause seufzt Heinrix.{/n} "Na gut, Ihr habt vielleicht nicht unrecht. Es ist schon möglich – eventuell – dass ich mich in letzter Zeit ... anders als sonst verhalten habe. Unsere momentane Situation belastet mich und auch die jüngsten Ereignisse fordern offenbar ihren Tribut. Ich werde versuchen, mich zusammenzureißen und nachsichtiger zu sein."
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer langen Pause seufzt Heinrix.{/n} "Na gut, Ihr habt vielleicht nicht unrecht. Es ist schon möglich – eventuell – dass ich mich in letzter Zeit ... anders als sonst verhalten habe. Unsere momentane Situation belastet mich und auch die jüngsten Ereignisse fordern offenbar ihren Tribut. Ich werde versuchen, mich zusammenzureißen und nachsichtiger zu sein."

languages.text: {n}Uzun bir duraksamanın ardından Heinrix iç çekiyor.{/n} "Tamam, haklı olabilirsin. Son zamanlarda bir miktar... Farklı davranmış olmam olası, sadece olası diyorum. Mevcut koşulların ve kısa süre önce yaşanan olayların yarattığı gerginliğin beni de kötü etkilediği aşikâr. Kendime çekidüzen vermeye ve daha fazla müsamaha göstermeye çalışacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}After a long pause, Heinrix sighs.{/n} "Fine, you may have a point. It's possible — just possible — that lately I have been acting... slightly differently. The strain of our current circumstances and recent events have clearly taken their toll on me as well. I will try to pull myself together and to show greater forbearance."
